verses.verse: That which <S%G3739><s%> was from the beginning, <S%G746><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> we have heard, <S%G191><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> we have seen <S%G3708><s%> with our eyes, <S%G3788><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> we have looked <S%G2300><s%> on, and our hands <S%G5495><s%> have handled, <S%G5584><s%> of the Word <S%G3056><s%> of life; <S%G2222><s%>

(For the life <S%G2222><s%> was manifested, <S%G5319><s%> and we have seen <S%G3708><s%> it, and bear <S%G3140><s%> witness, <S%G3140><s%> and show <S%G518><s%> to you that eternal <S%G166><s%> life, <S%G2222><s%> which <S%G3748><s%> was with the Father, <S%G3962><s%> and was manifested <S%G5319><s%> to us;)

That which <S%G3739><s%> we have seen <S%G3708><s%> and heard <S%G191><s%> declare <S%G518><s%> we to you, that you also <S%G2532><s%> may have <S%G2192><s%> fellowship <S%G2842><s%> with us: and truly <S%G1161><s%> our fellowship <S%G2842><s%> is with the Father, <S%G3962><s%> and with his Son <S%G5207><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ. <S%G5547><s%>
And these <S%G5023><s%> things write <S%G1125><s%> we to you, that your <S%G5216><s%> joy <S%G5479><s%> may be full. <S%G4137><s%>

This <S%G3778><s%> then <S%G2532><s%> is the message <S%G1860><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> we have heard <S%G191><s%> of him, and declare <S%G312><s%> to you, that God <S%G2316><s%> is light, <S%G5457><s%> and in him is no <S%G3756><s%> darkness <S%G4653><s%> at <S%G3762><s%> all. <S%G3762><s%>

If <S%G1437><s%> we say <S%G2036><s%> that we have <S%G2192><s%> fellowship <S%G2842><s%> with him, and walk <S%G4043><s%> in darkness, <S%G4655><s%> we lie, <S%G5574><s%> and do <S%G4160><s%> not the truth: <S%G225><s%>

But if <S%G1437><s%> we walk <S%G4043><s%> in the light, <S%G5457><s%> as he is in the light, <S%G5457><s%> we have <S%G2192><s%> fellowship <S%G2842><s%> one <S%G3391><s%> with another, <S%G240><s%> and the blood <S%G129><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> his Son <S%G5207><s%> cleans <S%G2511><s%> us from all <S%G3956><s%> sin. <S%G266><s%>
If <S%G1437><s%> we say <S%G2036><s%> that we have <S%G2192><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> sin, <S%G266><s%> we deceive <S%G4105><s%> ourselves, <S%G1438><s%> and the truth <S%G225><s%> is not in us.

If <S%G1437><s%> we confess <S%G3670><s%> our sins, <S%G266><s%> he is faithful <S%G4103><s%> and just <S%G1342><s%> to forgive <S%G863><s%> us our sins, <S%G266><s%> and to cleanse <S%G2511><s%> us from all <S%G3956><s%> unrighteousness. <S%G93><s%>
If <S%G1437><s%> we say <S%G2036><s%> that we have not sinned, <S%G264><s%> we make <S%G4160><s%> him a liar, <S%G5583><s%> and his word <S%G3056><s%> is not in us.
